text: Kristin Laura Kreuk (born December 30, 1982) is a Canadian actress. She is best known for her roles as Lana Lang in the Superman-inspired television series Smallville (2001–2011), Laurel Yeung in the Canadian teen drama series Edgemont (2001–2005), Catherine Chandler in The CW sci-fi romantic drama series Beauty & the Beast (2012–2016), and Joanna Hanley in the CBC legal drama series Burden of Truth (2018–2021). She has also appeared in films such as EuroTrip (2004), Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li (2009), and Vampire (2011). Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian movie actors
title: Kristin Kreuk
